channel.title: Site taking forever to respond (possible cloudfare issue?)
channel.description:
For the past.. what seems like nearly two months (though could be wrong) the site has been frequently taking a long time to respond to my requests for pages. Sometimes coming on to a minute before I'll get a respond back from the server to even start loading the page, sometimes it won't load at all and will just give me one of these:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ostlj.png[/img]
It happens so often that it makes using the site almost unusable. Any reason as to why this could be happening?

item.title: Site taking forever to respond (possible cloudfare issue?)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

It’s the same for me as well as it was before or after Cloudflare was turned off.

Read full topic

item.title: Site taking forever to respond (possible cloudfare issue?)
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:36, topic:445931”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=548793.msg4040156#msg4040156 date=1341541937]
yes this is much faster. moparscape still seems to be very slow for me, unaware if you have turned off CloudFlare on the given site.
[/quote]

It’s turned off on both, no idea how one could be slow and the other fast since they are on the same machine.[/quote]could’ve been my Internet. it’s been very jumpy recently.

Read full topic

item.source: Site taking forever to respond (possible cloudfare issue?)

item.title: Site taking forever to respond (possible cloudfare issue?)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:19, topic:445931”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=548793.msg4025088#msg4025088 date=1340280317]
I’ll turn it off and you guys can tell me if it has improved any then.

edit:
Alright, it’s off for moparisthebest.com, still on for moparisthebest.com, maybe you can compare your load times. It will take a few minutes for DNS to propagate though.

Cloudflare is supposed to make everything substantially faster.
[/quote]MITB is 100x faster now.[/quote]Same, I forgot how fast it could be… Especially when making replies and editing posts it’s very noticable

MITB could you turn it off on Moparscape too, and we’ll see if it makes it faster there too?

Read full topic
